Associate Newsletter JULY 2013
And the Winner of the MBO Home Office Makeover is....(drum roll, please) MBO’s First Annual Home Office Makeover sweepstakes was a wonderful success! We had hundreds of referrals, and our greatest compliment is when our Associates refer us <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program> to friends and colleagues who they believe would benefit from our services. We here at MBO feel your deeds should be recognized, which is why we developed a sweet deal to reward our Associates who are proud to share the MBO experience. For each referral you submitted to MBO, you earned an offical entry into our Home Office Makeover Sweepstakes in addition to the referral bonus program. Check out how we picked our winner as we tell the story in pictures <http://www.mbopartners.com/blog/and-home-office-makeover-winner>.
Take This 1-Minute Poll and Learn About Your Fellow Associates In order to better serve you, our valued Associates, we need to learn more about you! We can't think of a better way to do that than to informally poll you <https://mbopartners.us2.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_eQkFv2yOlVJ06NL> every now and again. Before you gloss over this fascinating story, trust us when we tell you this is far from a punishment!
This quick poll will not only give us insight into what motivates you as an Independent Consultant, it will instantly show you the anonymous results of your fellow Associates. We will then use this intelligence to create valuable programs tailored to your needs . Happy Polling! <https://mbopartners.us2.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_eQkFv2yOlVJ06NL>
Too Many Passwords Slowing you Down? Single Sign-On is Coming to MBO Partners! Do you have more passwords than you know what to do with? Have no fear! MBO Partners is pleased to announce the upcoming release of a new system upgrade that will improve the way you currently log in to your MBO accounts. We are instituting single sign-on capability between the MBO Business Center and MBO Access, allowing quick navigation to and between each site. With this update, once you log in to your MBO Business Center, you will be automatically logged into MBO Access if you choose to navigate to that site. Stay tuned for more information on the roll out of this exciting update, and please contact your Business Manager with any questions. CEO CORNER It's More Than a Project: Take Pride in Independence
16.9 million workers in America have experienced working independently, and within 5 years, that number will rise to 23 million. About 70 percent of those workers report high levels of satisfaction in their lifestyle, compared to 19 percent of traditional workers <http://www.forbes.com/sites/susanadams/2012/05/18/new-survey-majority-of-employees-dissatisfied/>. The sea change is clear; working by the project is the future of American labor.
So, what does 23 million mean for you? More> <http://info.mbopartners.com/CEOCornerJuly2013.html> BOOK REVIEW Kimball Norup, VP Western Region
Like many professionals I have a bookshelf in my office filled with interesting or recommended business books that I bought with every good intention of reading.
Unfortunately this collection has grown larger over the years as my available time to read clearly hasn’t matched my book buying appetite! There is, however, one book on that shelf that I have already read. More > <http://info.mbopartners.com/BookReviewKimballNorupJuly2013.html>
